name: MLCUpsampleLayer
desc: A layer that applies upsampling with the shape you specify.

items.name: init?(shape: [Int])
items.desc: Creates an upsample layer with the shape you specify.

items.name: init?(shape: [Int], sampleMode: MLCSampleMode, alignsCorners: Bool)
items.desc: Creates an upsample layer with the shape, upsampling algorithm, and corner alignment option you specify.

items.name: enum MLCSampleMode
items.desc: A sampling mode for an upsample layer.

items.name: var shape: [Int]
items.desc: An array that contains the dimensions of the result tensor.

items.name: var alignsCorners: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the layer aligns the corner pixels of the input and output tensors.
